title: ICT-1 appoints state defence counsel for Joy
body: The International Crimes Tribunal-1 appointed state defence counsel for Sajeeb Wazed Joy, an absconding accused in the crime against humanity case linked to last year's July uprising. The three-member tribunal led by Justice Md Golam Mortuza Mozumder made the appointment today. Another accused in the case, former state minister for ICT Zunaid Ahmed Palak, was produced before the court today. The tribunal fixed January 7 next year for further hearing in this case. Earlier on December 4, ICT-1 took cognisance of formal charges in two cases against Joy, former ICT adviser to deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina, and three others.
